name: anathan
text: Is it sad that relate to Roast Beef the most?

name: fifthsreversed
text: never.

name: tasteful
text: jim o'rourke

name: keithcozz
text: I am gonna go out on a limb, here, and say that I strongly suspect that most "Achewood" readers relate to Beef the most...

name: spinynorman
text: If any readers were like Ray they would not be reading Achewood. They would probably be trying to finance helicopters made out of dark chocolate or dying from various nutritional trainwrecks.

name: fermatprime
text:
I know people like Ray. My dad is like Ray, only somewhat saner.

I worry that I will turn into Ray... or Beef, for that matter.

name: madnes
text:
I am like Ray.

Unfortunately, reading Achewood has made me develop Beef-like anxieties about my Rayness.

I console myself by eating brie in the manner of pie.

name: tragicone
text: I'm more of a Teodor, myself.

name: griffypoo
text: I think I'd best relate to a Lyle who knows how to control his liquor intake.

name: ganymedeio
text: That's not exactly a Lyle, then, is it?

name: berami
text: Based on my feelings towards drinking whiskey and yelling about the Ace of Spades, I think I"m pretty Lyle-esque.

name: overmedicated
text: Will you marry me.

name: kotoku
text:
Most people I would venture to guess reach a certain age where the "Achewood" period in life falls.

For people like Ray they often do not reach that age.

They die.

Diabetes.

name: sezza
text: die-abetes

name: tfaironpirate
text: Great, one more thing to do today.

name: dtuba
text:
I used to be a lot like Roast Beef. These days, though, my overweight & lazy reflection in the mirror looks a lot like Teodor.

I think this is a good thing.

name: dtuba
text: please add "middle aged" to the above comment thx

name: baryonyx
text: On the contrary, I relate to Phileppe the most.

name: wittyname
text: That is because Phillipe taps into our collective childhood. I know I relate to his childish naiveté.

name: hellofditties
text: Does nobody know how to spell Philippe?

name: atticusonline
text: i luv filip!

name: lechatbotte
text: Silly, it's Felipe!

name: atticusonline
text: Ole!

name: ganymedeio
text: FeeRrrreep!

name: mremaknu
text: It's spelled HUUUUUUUGS!

name: madnes
text:
Lie-bot?

DAMN, so close!

name: ceres
text: I kinda relate to Teodor the most, and I wish it wasn't so. I'd take Todd over him.

name: straw
text: You have some rough cares going on, huh ceres?

name: tragicone
text:
shit. You should never want to be todd.

Todd is dumb and terrible.

name: red_rooster
text: damn... i thought he had a wicked good comeback too.

name: 1000hz
text: Molly made a mistake that night.

name: sneechles
text: Molly didn't make a mistake. This comment probably came after many depressing/non-responsive conversations with Beef and now she is frustrated. Again, sad. They should go to couples therapy.

name: epicurus
text: A comment left by epicurus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by blastradius, TonyHighwind, Scorpio_nadir, kenyot, alejandroadam, Darthemed)

name: tekende
text: My fiancee snores. Nearly every night I have to tell her to roll over.

name: pogo
text: So where was she when you-know-who visited?

name: tekende
text: What?

name: fineoakstructure
text:
I think he's referring to a rendezvous with another assetbar poster you documented, in innocence, about a year or so ago.

Ugh. I remember too much stuff from assetbar, I don't know why.

name: tekende
text: Oh. Well, the fiance mentioned above was no longer my fiance by the time I met bixschmix.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
whom we all used to live in fear would kick us apart.
(ooh!)

name: ganymedeio
text: Chubbied for a hella subtle reference.

name: soticoto
text: My girlfriend only stopped snoring about 10 minutes ago, and it was annoying the crap outta me.

name: tourach3
text:
just because you have sex with them, doesn't mean you can't kick them out of the bed afterwards
now come on, man!

name: blahhhhhhh
text: I know eh, why doesnt Molly just kick him out so she can get some sleep.

name: epicurus
text: And just in case it was at all unclear, I want to restate that I think snoring loudly and regularly is roughly on par with sexual abuse of a minor.

name: nickb285
text: As a snorer (not just when I'm on my back either), I was tempted to lame you, but then I realized you've explained why girls only sleep with me once. I salute you, sir, for finding the true answer among so many possibilities.

name: riotdejaneiro
text: He gets with ladies but in the end they do not like him!

name: heccibiggs
text: Four snorers lamed you.

name: i_love_kate
text: Or just child molestors who thought you were underselling their school-gate shenanigans.

name: aliiis
text: i_think_i_love_i_love_kate

name: tripperday
text: I wanted to chubby his comment too.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Schnorrers?

name: fattypneumonia
text:
Did someone call me "schnorrer?"

[IMGS OFF]

HOORAY HOORAY HOORAY!

name: mortshire
text:
Life is never neat;
Life is always bad.

name: nutmeg
text: i LOVE your icon. loooove it. what is it? live-action jetsons?

name: mortshire
text:
:) Thanks!
It's Twiki from Buck Rogers in the 25th Century:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dr._Theopolis

name: heccibiggs
text: You may be interested to know that live-action Jetsons is apparently coming!

name: pogo
text: I hope it doesn't suck as bad as the Flintones did.

name: tekende
text:
Oh, pogo.

Of course it will.

name: i_love_kate
text: Possibly John Goodman's least awesome role.

name: mugi
text: NOOOOOOOO

name: samorama
text: Once I got a dog that snore I could no longer get annoyed with the boy that snores.

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
Let sleeping dogs lie,
then you can ask a snoring
dog tell the dogs truth.


...Grasshopper

name: love_is_so_punk
text: When my dogs snore I think it's adorable.  When girls I'm sleeping with snore I want to smother them with a pillow.

name: talix18
text: The expression on Beef's face in the last panel.  Pure Beef gold.

name: clever-nickname
text: work on our Serrrrve

name: dasilodavi
text: Serrrrrve!

name: kledermans
text: This sounds so much like my girlfriend and me.  So true.

name: dutch
text: still my favorite achewood strip.

name: mindbnder
text: I believe this is an Instance feared by the Beef.

name: molesticide
text:
this strip didn't do much for me.

then i started living with a girl.

now i'm convinced this is one of the most well-written things the internet has ever produced.

the best, POSSIBLE, use of a silent final panel.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: I wish he'd farted in that last panel.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: that would be just too much comedy for one strip.

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
No. I can't believe Onstad missed that easy floater.
Beef's expression is already right. It would have been perfect.


...


...


BRAAPPP!

name: chewy
text: Snoring affects peoples lives. She gets no sleep because I snore. I get no sleep because she's telling me I snore. Ad naueseum

name: presterjohn
text: I have been exactly where Beef is in the last panel.

name: ringwoodcomics
text: He. Doesn't. WEAR. A. SHIRT!

name: heccibiggs
text: He does sometimes.

name: quazifuji
text: Not when he's sleeping, though.  It certainly wouldn't have helped in this strip.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Ray: I like wine!
Nice Pete: Chapter 2

name: fuyukodachi
text: When Molly turns over, only her upper body turns over.  Her legs and tail are still facing in the same direction they were in when she sat up to push Beef.  I realize cats are capable of this, but it seems a bit uncomfortable unless it is, in fact, the Position of Most Derision.

name: stormagnet
text: Molly is all hella concerned about The Apnea. She is too concerned to wait until morning!

name: heccibiggs
text: Great. Just what I needed to discover existed right before I went to bed.

name: stormagnet
text: Man, you thin central sleep apnea's scary, wait until you hear about [i]central.[i]

name: stormagnet
text: God dammit BBCode, you SOAFB.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
holy crap i think i have that.

the girlfriend tells me i sometimes cease breathing and then she pushes on me. then i wake up all frustrated like Beef.

does your whole body have to go numb for it to be true 'cos sometimes my left ring finger does so randomly. maybe that's a thing, though. or maybe pretend strokes. i don't know.

name: mattylite
text: Whoa, I didn't realize Apnea was one of those diseases like Gout or AIDS that gets its very own "The" in front of it when you say it.  I better update my list.

name: theplaidknight
text: Don't forget The Diabeetis

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
Quote:
Symptoms that suggest sleep apnea are snoring, being overweight, hypertension, daytime sleepiness, periods where breathing stops at night, and frequent auto accidents.


wait, wait...what? frequent auto accidents ..? as a SYMPTOM ??

name: laserblade
text: Ths first couple times I read this strip, I thought Roast Beef wanted to sew a tennis racket to the front of his shirt and a tennis ball to the back of Molly's. Which would have been slightly funnier I think.

name: greenkoolayd
text: it would make more sense, them being cats, and all.

name: shalashaska
text: Hahaha that was awesome

name: dasilodavi
text: Serrrrve!

name: greenkoolayd
text: good joke, beef.  bad timing, beef.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: Tango of the Tangled Sheets, in the key of Bad Breath.

name: lolsworth
text: Beef would rather die than be pushed.

name: hendetta
text: How's about you sew a golf ball to your panties and we use my NINE IRON to score a HOLE IN OOOOOONE !
